upload.title: Upload file icon
upload.error: Failed to upload image. Check size and format and try again
upload.validate: Format PNG or JPG / Maximum size: 1MB
upload.note: Updates may take up to minute propagate to the live store.

message.charge_to_use_trans: to Premium to display different languages on the cookie banner for different domain.

no_items_desc: Try changing the filters or search term
required_pro: This feature is only available with our

HomePage.title: Dashboards

intro.title: Add Omega Cookies Banner to your online store
intro.update_privacy_text: to update your Customer privacy preferences
intro.turn_on_embedded_text: to turn on our embedded app on your online store.

gcmBanner.title: Implementing Google Consent Mode V2 is mandatory by March 2024
gcmBanner.content: If your store use Google services like Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager or Google Ads, implementing Google Consent Mode V2 with a cookie banner is mandatory by March 2024. Update app to integrate Google Consent Mode V2 to cookie banner.

HomePage.subtitle: Welcome to Omega GDPR/CCPA Cookie Banner

integration.consentDesc: Please note that the consent event only available when when Consent Mode is enabled
integration.haveGtm: I have already installed Google Tag Manager
integration.security_storage: Enables storage related to security such as authentication functionality, fraud prevention, and other user protection.
integration.functionality_storage: Enables storage that supports the functionality of the website or app e.g. language settings.
integration.ad_personalization: Sets consent for sending user data related to advertising to Google
integration.ad_storage: Enables storage (such as cookies) related to advertising.
integration.analytics_storage: Enables storage (such as cookies) related to analytics e.g. visit duration.
integration.personalization_storage: Enables storage related to personalization e.g. video recommendations
integration.ads_data_redaction: When ad_storage is denied, new cookies will not be set for advertising purposes. Additionally, third-party cookies previously set on google.com and doubleclick.net will not be used except for spam and fraud purposes. Data sent to Google will still include the full page URL, including any ad click information in the URL parameters.
integration.url_passthrough: Passing ad click, client ID, and session ID information in URLs
integration.tagInfo: Tag Manager gives you the ability to add and update your own tags for conversion tracking, site analytics, remarketing, and more.
integration.analyticInfo: Google Analytics is a web analytics service offered by Google that tracks and reports website traffic, currently as a platform inside the Google Marketing Platform brand.
integration.fbPixelInfo: Facebook is a social networking site that makes it easy for you to connect and share with family and friends online.
integration.tiktokInfo: TikTok, known in China as Douyin, is a short-form video hosting service owned by ByteDance.
integration.customDemo: Ex. your script like: {{script}}, please add {{link}} to text box below
integration.copyHelpText: Copy code above and paste it to the below the opening {{tagName}} tag in the theme.liquid file.

setting.heading: Settings
setting.requiredAction: Block user interact to store before give consent tracking
setting.dismiss_hide_banner: Don't show banner again next time if declined
setting.showCookiesBtn: Cookie button for changing preference later

policy.link_policy: Link of your Privacy Policy’s page
policy.text_customize_info:
If you have your own link of Privacy Policy's page, you can paste
this to the text box on

text.default_lang: Default language on your main website
text.heading: Text Customization
text.lang_select: Default language on your main website
text.link_policy: Link of your Privacy Policy's page

advanced.title: Advanced
advanced.pages_lock_info: List of pages which you do not want to show cookie banner. One page per row

category.title: Categories
category.delete_title: Are you sure you want to delete this category? (Cookies in this category will become unregistered cookies)

cookie.title: Cookie
cookie.delete_title: Are you sure you want to delete this cookie?

intro.title: Cookie Scanner
intro.note_1: All of the cookies that are scanned by the Cookie Scanner when a customer visits the store for a first time will be shown here.
intro.note_2: Unpublished saved cookies will be stored up to 30 days before deleted automatically.

consent.title: Consent Log
consent.export_subtitle: Export consent logs to a Excel file
consent.export_custom_subtext: Customers' consent logs will be saved up to 30 days
consent.delete_all_title: Are you sure you want to delete all users?
consent.placeholder: Search by customer email or category
consent.no_items_desc: Customers' cookie preference and changes will be shown here and saved up to 30 days

email.title: Email templates
email.desc: Edit how the mail to you and your customers look

login.title: Email login
login.desc: We’ll send the emails to customers when they make a request to view, edit or delete on your behalf. Log in to your email to start editing email templates, which will be sent to customers whenever a request is submitted.
login.logged: You are currently using {{email}} to send emails to your customers when there is a request.

logo.title: logo
logo.desc: Include logo in email notification every time customers make a request
logo.sub: You can find a picture URL in Shopify admin/Content/Files and click Copy link

variable.title: Variables
variable.desc: Variables will be replaced with the corresponding value per each request/response. Variables can be used in both title and content.

email.customer_pane: Email to customers when they submit a data {{type}} request
email.merchant_pane: Email to your own inbox when there is a new request

logs.title: Request logs
logs.desc: Your requests will be noted here. Get customers’ emails here and mark the request as done.
logs.export_title: Are you sure you want to export data to Excel file?
logs.export_sub_title: Export request logs to a Excel file
logs.export_custom_desc: Customers' request logs will be saved up to 30 days

rightPage.title: Data Rights Page
rightPage.desc: Create a page which helps customers exercise their data privacy rights such as view, edit and delete collected data.
rightPage.heading: Data rights and data compliance page
rightPage.subHeading: Date rights where customers can exercise their data rights can be created here. See a demo page we created. Note that once created it will be available to see and edit in Online Store/Pages, and can be manually published.

pricing.title: Pricing Plans

down.title: Are you sure you want to downgrade?
down.desc: You are currently enjoying {{current}} version perks, which can help you business tremendously.

pricing.subtitle: We offer the best price for the best value.
pricing.trial_text: Every plans start with 3-day free trial.
pricing.attr_1: Customize color and text for banner
pricing.attr_3: Customize color and text for preferences
pricing.attr_7: Statistics list of users who accept cookies
pricing.attr_9: Customer can accept some cookies / accept all cookies

terms.statistics_accept: Statistics list of users who accept cookies
terms.can_accept_all_cookie: Customer can accept some cookies / accept all cookies
terms.change_consent_expiration: Change consent expiration days on Online Store
terms.integrate_pixel: Integrate with Omega Facebook pixel and Omega TikTok pixel
terms.multiple_language: Multiple languages for different store domains

translation.title: Translations
translation.enable_subtitle: Change the text on cookie banner to native’s language to better support and comply with local regulations.
translation.url_help: URL detection works if URL path starts with the language locale. e.x. https://domain.com/de
translation.store_help: Store language detection will automatically the locale of store
translation.geo_help: User's browser detection will automatically match the language with languages of customer's browser
translation.browser_help: Customer's IP detection will automatically match the geography of customer
translation.language_selector: Show language selector on Cookie Banner on your storefront
translation.scopes_subtitle: By limiting the languages you use, it will improve the performance of Cookie banner on your website.
translation.edit_subtitle: Change/edit texts in different languages which will appear on the cookie banner of your accordant websites.
